Summary: small meteor like with no impact site
divs: Sighting Detailson the night Im speaking myself and several wittnesses seen a meteor type object'base ball sized impact in my back yard allmost totaly vertical'and we searched for it about six of us and coulded find a impact site. the following morning we searched again with the same results.if you have some one near with a rad counter the area is small it was write there in front of us. I mean danger close and like I said no impact site.too search the area would not take long. but would put my mind at rest and my wife you see my property is on a indian berial site and we have seen many strang things here. unrelated im sure. thank you. Rev Douglas Hatt
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kilgore
There were no other sightings in Kilgore on or around March 17th 2005
